biotools.summary: CusVarDB is a tool for building customized sample-specific variant protein database from next-generation sequencing datasets. CusVarDB is a tool for creating a variant protein database from Next-generation sequencing datasets. The program supports variant calling for Genome, RNA-Seq and ExomeSeq datasets.
